column3: Total No. of Cases for Trial including Pending Cases from previous year (Col. 3)
column5: No. of Cases - Compounded or Withdrawn  (Col. 5)

column7: No. of Cases in which Trials Completed - Acquitted or Discharged (Col. 7)

column11: Percentage of Pendency to All India Total (Col. 11)
